name: Political Shitstorm (Paulsicle)
description:
Game made in 48 hours for the 2016 Nordic Game Jam. Made it to the finals with 14 other games. (There may be some bugs)

Play as the Prime Minister of the UK and try to be as corrupt as possible without the people finding out.

Paul Palmer (https://paulsiclegames.wordpress.com) - Writing, design
Alice Bowman (https://alicemakesgames.com/) -Writing, design
Mark Bowen (https://caeora.com) - Design, writing
James Forward (https://jamesfoward.wordpress.com/) - Programming
Aina Fiol (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aina-fiol-blanes-49497...) - Art, design

Downloadable version available at: https://alicebowman.itch.io/political-shitstorm
